channel.title: Kathmandu on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kathmandu on Martin's Blog

item.title: Kathmandu
item.description: Had a rather chaotic return to Kathmandu as I had to find a taxi and as I came out the domestic terminal there was not much of accommodation for foreigners. I do advise to anyone else to get themselves a local SIM card with data install taxi apps and use them to order one as you will get much better prices and less of a hassle with haggling. Headed back to the original hotel we had our meeting at just to pick up some of my luggage I left there.
